tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: During the call, doctor told me that she will prescribe me one oral medicine and one more pill to insert. However after the call when i got the prescription, she prescribed me one cream and one powder which she never explained how to use. I even texted her using practo chat option to ask how to use but got no reply. Further 2 medicines were mentioned in general advices instead of prescription. I had to google the meaning of these advices then only i got to know that these are medicines.
reply_text:
Hey.. We are really sorry to read this
On practo application each & every medicine is not mentioned, in few cases we have to mention in general advice column
Application of prescribed medicine was explained there only and we always make sure to answer each & every query of our patient

review: As a foreigner(I'm not Indian citizen) . Iam African, I searched in internet about the best gynecology and infertility specialist from New Delhi,India. Then the names appears but when I ready the recommendation from the patients who seek medical advice from Dk Ruchi, they talk positive about her. So I find her telephone number and e mail after that I wrote to her an email explaining my status and my problem and tell her where I am  then she respond very quickly and ask me to do some medical check up and the  I sent her the result. Then She assist me with a letter  so as to get Visa to go India. Finally I got there and I meet her, to make story short, It took at least three month to accomplish my desire with successfully stories to tell the world.. Thanks Dk Ruchi Malhotra. *** *** ** **** **** ****** ****** **** *** ** *** **** ** ****** **** **** ** *** *
